members.name: Animate
members.description: When true, programmatic SetCenter/SetZoom/SetTilt/SetHeading changes are animated.

members.name: Center
members.description: Map center position. Two-way bindable via @bind-Center. When set, overrides Options.Center. Updated when the user pans the map.

members.name: DisabledBehaviors
members.description: Bitmask of behavior features to disable on this map.

members.name: Heading
members.description: Map heading (rotation) in degrees. Two-way bindable via @bind-Heading. When set, overrides Options.Heading. Updated on user rotation gesture.

members.name: Tilt
members.description: Map tilt angle in degrees. Two-way bindable via @bind-Tilt. When set, overrides Options.Tilt. Updated on user tilt gesture.

members.name: ViewportPadding
members.description: Viewport padding. Applied when changed after map init.

members.name: Zoom
members.description: Map zoom level. Two-way bindable via @bind-Zoom. When set, overrides Options.Zoom. Updated when the user zooms the map.

members.name: CenterChanged
members.description: Callback for two-way binding of . Fired when the user finishes panning (on mapviewchangeend).

members.name: HeadingChanged
members.description: Callback for two-way binding of . Fired when the user finishes rotating (on mapviewchangeend).

members.name: OnBaseLayerChange
members.description: Fired when the base layer changes.

members.name: OnClick
members.description: Fired when the map background is tapped/clicked (no object hit).

members.name: OnContextMenu
members.description: Fired on right-click on the map.

members.name: OnContextMenuClose
members.description: Fired when context menu interaction ends.

members.name: OnDoubleClick
members.description: Fired on double-tap/double-click on the map.

members.name: OnDrag
members.description: Fired continuously during a map drag.

members.name: OnDragEnd
members.description: Fired when a drag operation ends on the map.

members.name: OnDragStart
members.description: Fired when a drag operation starts on the map.

members.name: OnEngineStateChange
members.description: Fired when the render engine state changes.

members.name: OnError
members.description: Fired when an error is detected, such as an API key authentication failure.

members.name: OnLongPress
members.description: Fired on long press on the map.

members.name: OnMapViewChange
members.description: Fired continuously while the map view changes (zoom, pan, tilt).

members.name: OnMapViewChangeEnd
members.description: Fired when a map view change ends.

members.name: OnMapViewChangeStart
members.description: Fired when a map view change starts.

members.name: OnPointerCancel
members.description: Fired when a pointer action is cancelled.

members.name: OnPointerDown
members.description: Fired when a pointer touches the map surface.

members.name: OnPointerEnter
members.description: Fired when a pointer enters the map area.

members.name: OnPointerLeave
members.description: Fired when a pointer leaves the map area.

members.name: OnPointerMove
members.description: Fired when a pointer moves over the map.

members.name: OnPointerUp
members.description: Fired when a pointer leaves the map surface.

members.name: OnResize
members.description: Fired when the map container is resized.

members.name: OnWheel
members.description: Fired on mouse wheel scroll over the map.

members.name: TiltChanged
members.description: Callback for two-way binding of . Fired when the user finishes tilting (on mapviewchangeend).

members.name: ZoomChanged
members.description: Callback for two-way binding of . Fired when the user finishes zooming (on mapviewchangeend).

members.name: Value
members.description: Current text value of the input.

members.name: Placeholder
members.description: Placeholder text for the input.

members.name: Disabled
members.description: Whether the input is disabled.

members.name: InputAttributes
members.description: Dictionary of HTML attributes and event handlers that must be applied to the custom input element via @attributes splatting. Contains value, placeholder, disabled, autocomplete, oninput, onkeydown, and onfocusout.

members.name: Items
members.description: The current list of suggestion items.

members.name: ActiveIndex
members.description: Index of the currently highlighted item (-1 if none).

members.name: SelectItem
members.description: Call this to select an item (updates the input value and fires OnItemSelected). Use with @onmousedown + @onmousedown:preventDefault on your custom items.

members.name: Type
members.description: The HERE event type string.

members.name: GetPrecision()
members.description: Gets the precision (number of segments) of this circle (H.map.Circle.getPrecision).

members.name: GetElevation()
members.description: Gets the elevation of this circle in meters (H.map.Circle.getElevation).

members.name: GetExtrusion()
members.description: Gets the extrusion height of this circle in meters (H.map.Circle.getExtrusion).

members.name: GetBoundingBox()
members.description: Gets the bounding box of this circle (H.map.Circle.getBoundingBox).

members.name: CenterLat
members.description: Center latitude. Two-way bindable via @bind-CenterLat.

members.name: CenterLng
members.description: Center longitude. Two-way bindable via @bind-CenterLng.

members.name: Clickable
members.description: If true, the circle is clickable.

members.name: Data
members.description: Arbitrary data associated with this circle.

members.name: Draggable
members.description: If true, the circle can be dragged.

members.name: Elevation
members.description: 3D elevation in meters (HARP engine).

members.name: Extrusion
members.description: 3D extrusion height in meters (HARP engine).

members.name: FillColor
members.description: Fill color in CSS format.

members.name: LineCap
members.description: Line cap style: "round", "square", "butt".

members.name: LineDash
members.description: Array of dash pattern [dash, gap, dash, gap, ...].

members.name: LineDashOffset
members.description: Offset into the dash pattern.

members.name: LineJoin
members.description: Line join style: "round", "miter", "bevel".

members.name: LineWidth
members.description: Line width in pixels.

members.name: Precision
members.description: Number of points used to approximate the circle (default: 72).

members.name: Radius
members.description: Radius in meters. Two-way bindable via @bind-Radius.

members.name: StrokeColor
members.description: Stroke color in CSS format.

members.name: Visible
members.description: If true, the circle is visible.

members.name: ZIndex
members.description: Z-index for stacking order.

members.name: Center
members.description: Center of the circle.

members.name: Radius
members.description: Radius in meters.

members.name: Style
members.description: Visual style for the circle.

members.name: Precision
members.description: Number of segments for the circle approximation (default 60).

members.name: Extrusion
members.description: Extrusion height in meters (3D rendering).

members.name: Elevation
members.description: Elevation in meters (3D rendering).

members.name: Lat
members.description: Latitude of the data point.

members.name: Lng
members.description: Longitude of the data point.

members.name: Weight
members.description: Weight of the data point for clustering aggregation.

members.name: Data
members.description: Optional arbitrary data attached to this point.

members.name: Eps
members.description: Epsilon parameter for DBSCAN clustering. Controls cluster radius. Default: 32.

members.name: MinWeight
members.description: Minimum weight for a cluster to be formed. Default: 2.

members.name: Strategy
members.description: Clustering strategy.

members.name: Position
members.description: Geographic position of the cluster/point.

members.name: Weight
members.description: Total weight of the cluster (1 for noise points).

members.name: PointCount
members.description: Number of data points in the cluster (1 for noise points).

members.name: IsCluster
members.description: Whether this is a cluster (true) or a noise/single point (false).

members.name: ChildContent
members.description: Menu items defined as child content.

members.name: OnItemClick
members.description: Fired when a menu item is clicked.

members.name: Position
members.description: Geographic position where the context menu was opened.

members.name: ItemLabel
members.description: Label of the selected menu item.

members.name: ItemData
members.description: Custom data associated with the selected menu item.

members.name: ViewportX
members.description: Viewport X coordinate where the menu was opened.

members.name: ViewportY
members.description: Viewport Y coordinate where the menu was opened.

members.name: Data
members.description: Custom data associated with this item.

members.name: Disabled
members.description: Whether the menu item is disabled.

members.name: Label
members.description: Display text for the menu item.

members.name: Max
members.description: Maximum zoom level.

members.name: Min
members.description: Minimum zoom level.

members.name: Opacity
members.description: Layer opacity (0-1).

members.name: TileSize
members.description: Tile size in pixels.

members.name: UrlPattern
members.description: URL pattern with {x}, {y}, {z} placeholders.

members.name: Visible
members.description: If true, the custom tile layer is visible.

members.name: Active
members.description: Whether the measurement tool is active.

members.name: Alignment
members.description: UI alignment position.

members.name: OnMeasured
members.description: Fired when a measurement is completed, with distance in meters.

members.name: ChildContent
members.description: HTML content for the DomIcon. Read as static HTML.

members.name: Clickable
members.description: If true, the marker can be clicked.

members.name: Data
members.description: Arbitrary data associated with this DomMarker.

members.name: Draggable
members.description: If true, the marker can be dragged.

members.name: Lat
members.description: Latitude in degrees. Two-way bindable via @bind-Lat.

members.name: Lng
members.description: Longitude in degrees. Two-way bindable via @bind-Lng.

members.name: MaxZoom
members.description: Maximum zoom level at which the marker is visible.

members.name: MinZoom
members.description: Minimum zoom level at which the marker is visible.

members.name: Opacity
members.description: Opacity of the marker (0-1).

members.name: Visible
members.description: Whether the marker is visible.

members.name: ZIndex
members.description: Z-index for stacking order.

members.name: Icon
members.description: DomIcon for the marker.

members.name: State
members.description: The engine state value.

members.name: Type
members.description: The HERE event type string.

members.name: ObjectCount
members.description: Number of objects loaded from the GeoJSON data.

members.name: DefaultStyle
members.description: Default style to apply to loaded objects.

members.name: GeoJsonString
members.description: Inline GeoJSON string (alternative to Url).

members.name: Url
members.description: URL of the GeoJSON file to load.

members.name: Visible
members.description: Whether the loaded layer is visible.

members.name: OnLoaded
members.description: Fired when the GeoJSON data has been loaded and parsed.

members.name: Data
members.description: Arbitrary data associated with this group.

members.name: Visible
members.description: If true, the group and all its children are visible.

members.name: ZIndex
members.description: Z-index for stacking order.

members.name: Objects
members.description: Initial objects to add to the group.

members.name: Colors
members.description: Color stops for the heatmap gradient. Keys are 0-1 thresholds, values are CSS colors.

members.name: DataPoints
members.description: Data points for the heatmap.

members.name: Opacity
members.description: Opacity of the heatmap layer (0-1).

members.name: SampleDepth
members.description: Sampling depth for heatmap calculation.

members.name: Visible
members.description: If true, the heatmap layer is visible.

members.name: Lat
members.description: Latitude.

members.name: Lng
members.description: Longitude.

members.name: Value
members.description: Intensity value for the heatmap.

members.name: CssClass
members.description: Additional CSS class applied to the wrapper div.

members.name: DebounceMs
members.description: Debounce delay in milliseconds before triggering a search. Default: 300.

members.name: Design
members.description: Predefined design variant for the component. Default: .

members.name: Disabled
members.description: Disables the input when true.

members.name: InputTemplate
members.description: Custom template for rendering the input area. The provides an InputAttributes dictionary that must be splatted onto the custom <input> element.

members.name: MinChars
members.description: Minimum number of characters before triggering a search. Default: 3.

members.name: Options
members.description: Search configuration options (language, country filter, limit, bias location).

members.name: Placeholder
members.description: Placeholder text for the input field.

members.name: SuggestionItemTemplate
members.description: Custom template for rendering each suggestion item. When set, replaces the default item content inside the <li> shell (click handler and active class are preserved). Ignored when is set.

members.name: SuggestionListTemplate
members.description: Custom template for rendering the entire suggestion dropdown. When set, replaces the default <ul> list completely. Use to wire up item selection.

members.name: Value
members.description: Current text value of the input (two-way bindable via @bind-Value).

members.name: OnCleared
members.description: Fires when the input is cleared.

members.name: OnError
members.description: Fires when an authentication error is detected during autosuggest.

members.name: OnItemSelected
members.description: Fires when the user selects a suggestion from the dropdown.

members.name: ValueChanged
members.description: Callback for two-way binding of Value.

members.name: Height
members.description: Default height 500px. Used as style attribute "height: {Height}"

members.name: GetSize()
members.description: Gets the size of the icon (H.map.Icon.getSize).

members.name: GetState()
members.description: Gets the loading state of the icon (H.map.Icon.getState).

members.name: GetAnchor()
members.description: Gets the anchor point of the icon (H.map.Icon.getAnchor).

members.name: Bottom
members.description: Bottom latitude of the overlay bounds.

members.name: ImageUrl
members.description: URL of the image to overlay (HTTP URL or data URI).

members.name: Left
members.description: Left longitude of the overlay bounds.

members.name: Opacity
members.description: Overlay opacity (0-1).

members.name: Right
members.description: Right longitude of the overlay bounds.

members.name: Top
members.description: Top latitude of the overlay bounds.

members.name: Visible
members.description: If true, the overlay is visible.

members.name: GetState()
members.description: Gets the state of the InfoBubble (H.ui.InfoBubble.getState): "open" or "closed".

members.name: GetPosition()
members.description: Gets the current position of the InfoBubble (H.ui.InfoBubble.getPosition).

members.name: AutoPan
members.description: Whether the map automatically pans to show the InfoBubble (default true).

members.name: ChildContent
members.description: HTML content for the InfoBubble. Read as static HTML.

members.name: IsOpen
members.description: Whether the InfoBubble is currently open. Two-way bindable via @bind-IsOpen.

members.name: Lat
members.description: Latitude of the InfoBubble anchor position.

members.name: Lng
members.description: Longitude of the InfoBubble anchor position.

members.name: IsOpenChanged
members.description: Callback for two-way binding of . Fired when the InfoBubble is closed by clicking the X button.

members.name: Content
members.description: HTML content for the InfoBubble.

members.name: DefaultStyle
members.description: Default style to apply to loaded objects.

members.name: Url
members.description: URL of the KML file to load.

members.name: Visible
members.description: Whether the loaded layer is visible.

members.name: OnLoaded
members.description: Fired when the KML data has been loaded and parsed.

members.name: GetZIndex()
members.description: Gets the z-index of this map object (H.map.Object.getZIndex).

members.name: BehaviorGuid
members.description: GUID of the H.mapevents.Behavior instance (for interaction control).

members.name: UIGuid
members.description: GUID of the H.ui.UI instance (for InfoBubble management).

members.name: RemoveAllObjects()
members.description: Removes all objects from this map.

members.name: ZoomAt(double zoom, double x, double y)
GetBaseLayer()
members.description: Gets the base layer of the map (H.Map.getBaseLayer).

members.name: CaptureAsync()
members.description: Captures the current map view as a Base64 data URI (PNG).

members.name: SetViewportPadding(int top, int right, int bottom, int left)
ToGeoJsonAsync()
members.description: Exports all map objects as a GeoJSON FeatureCollection string.

members.name: GetMinZoom()
members.description: Gets the current minimum zoom level.

members.name: GetMaxZoom()
members.description: Gets the current maximum zoom level.

members.name: ViewportX
members.description: X coordinate in the map viewport (pixels).

members.name: ViewportY
members.description: Y coordinate in the map viewport (pixels).

members.name: Position
members.description: Geographic position of the drag point on the map.

members.name: Type
members.description: The HERE event type string (e.g. "dragstart", "drag", "dragend").

members.name: Source
members.description: The error source (e.g. "tile", "service").

members.name: Message
members.description: Human-readable error message.

members.name: StatusCode
members.description: HTTP status code when available (e.g. 401, 403).

members.name: Padding
members.description: Padding for the map viewport (H.map.ViewPort.Padding).

members.name: AutoColor
members.description: Whether automatic UI color adaptation is enabled (default true).

members.name: UiLocale
members.description: Locale for UI controls (e.g. "de-DE", "es-ES", "fr-FR"). Supported: en-US, de-DE, es-ES, fi-FI, fr-FR, it-IT, nl-NL, pl-PL, pt-BR, pt-PT, ru-RU, tr-TR, zh-CN.

members.name: PixelRatio
members.description: Pixel ratio for high-DPI displays (e.g. 2.0 for Retina).

members.name: FixedCenter
members.description: Whether the map center stays fixed during resize.

members.name: Validate()
members.description: Validates that Zoom is within MinZoom/MaxZoom bounds and that MinZoom <= MaxZoom.

members.name: ViewportX
members.description: X coordinate in the map viewport (pixels).

members.name: ViewportY
members.description: Y coordinate in the map viewport (pixels).

members.name: Position
members.description: Geographic position of the pointer on the map, if available.

members.name: Button
members.description: Mouse button that triggered the event (0 = left, 1 = middle, 2 = right).

members.name: Buttons
members.description: Bitmask of currently pressed buttons.

members.name: PointerType
members.description: Pointer type: "mouse", "touch", or "pen".

members.name: Type
members.description: The HERE event type string (e.g. "tap", "pointerdown").

members.name: Width
members.description: New width of the map container in pixels.

members.name: Height
members.description: New height of the map container in pixels.

members.name: Center
members.description: Current center of the map.

members.name: Zoom
members.description: Current zoom level.

members.name: Tilt
members.description: Current tilt angle in degrees.

members.name: Heading
members.description: Current heading (rotation) in degrees.

members.name: Type
members.description: The HERE event type string.

members.name: Delta
members.description: Scroll delta value.

members.name: ViewportX
members.description: X coordinate in the map viewport (pixels).

members.name: ViewportY
members.description: Y coordinate in the map viewport (pixels).

members.name: GetIcon()
members.description: Gets the icon associated with this marker (H.map.Marker.getIcon).

members.name: IsDraggable()
members.description: Gets the draggable state of the marker.

members.name: ClusterSvgTemplate
members.description: SVG template for cluster markers. Use {count} and {color} as placeholders.

members.name: DataPoints
members.description: Data points to cluster.

members.name: Eps
members.description: Epsilon (radius) for clustering. Default: 32.

members.name: MaxZoom
members.description: Maximum zoom level at which clustering is active.

members.name: MinWeight
members.description: Minimum weight to form a cluster. Default: 2.

members.name: MinZoom
members.description: Minimum zoom level at which clustering is active.

members.name: NoiseSvgTemplate
members.description: SVG template for noise (single) markers.

members.name: OnClusterTap
members.description: Fired when a cluster is tapped.

members.name: OnNoiseTap
members.description: Fired when a noise (single) point is tapped.

members.name: Clickable
members.description: If true, the marker can be clicked and triggers tap event.

members.name: Draggable
members.description: If true, the marker can be dragged.

members.name: IconUrl
members.description: URL or SVG string for a custom icon.

members.name: Lat
members.description: Latitude in degrees. Two-way bindable via @bind-Lat.

members.name: Lng
members.description: Longitude in degrees. Two-way bindable via @bind-Lng.

members.name: MaxZoom
members.description: Maximum zoom level at which the marker is visible.

members.name: MinZoom
members.description: Minimum zoom level at which the marker is visible.

members.name: Opacity
members.description: Opacity of the marker (0-1).

members.name: Title
members.description: Title/tooltip text for accessibility.

members.name: Visible
members.description: Whether the marker is visible.

members.name: ZIndex
members.description: Z-index for stacking order.

members.name: LatChanged
members.description: Callback for two-way binding of . Fired when the marker is dragged to a new position.

members.name: LngChanged
members.description: Callback for two-way binding of . Fired when the marker is dragged to a new position.

members.name: Position
members.description: The geographic position of the marker. Set via CreateAsync, not serialized.

members.name: Icon
members.description: Icon for the marker (URL string, SVG string, or Icon object reference).

members.name: Draggable
members.description: Whether the marker is draggable.

members.name: Alignment
members.description: UI alignment position.

members.name: ZoomDelta
members.description: Zoom level delta between main map and overview (default: 4).

members.description: Gets the elevation of this polygon in meters (H.map.Polygon.getElevation).

members.description: Gets the extrusion height of this polygon in meters (H.map.Polygon.getExtrusion).

members.description: Array of dash pattern [dash, gap, dash, gap, ...].

members.description: Line join style: "round", "miter", "bevel".

members.name: Visible
members.description: If true, the route polyline is visible.

members.name: OnError
members.description: Fired when a route calculation fails with an exception.

members.name: OnRouteCalculated
members.description: Fired when the route calculation completes.

members.name: CenterLat
members.description: Circle center latitude after drag.

members.name: CenterLng
members.description: Circle center longitude after drag.

members.name: Top
members.description: Rect top after drag.

members.name: Left
members.description: Rect left after drag.

members.name: Bottom
members.description: Rect bottom after drag.

members.name: Right
members.description: Rect right after drag.

members.name: Path
members.description: Polygon/Polyline path after drag.

members.name: State
members.description: The state value.

members.name: Type
members.description: The HERE event type string.

members.name: StrokeColor
members.description: Stroke color in CSS format (e.g. "rgba(0, 0, 255, 0.5)" or "#0000FF").

members.name: FillColor
members.description: Fill color in CSS format.

members.name: LineWidth
members.description: Width of the line in pixels.

members.name: LineCap
members.description: Line cap style: "round", "square", "butt".

members.name: LineDash
members.description: Array of dash pattern [dash, gap, dash, gap, ...].

members.name: LineDashImage
members.description: URL or reference to a dash image (HARP engine feature).

members.name: LineDashScaleMode
members.description: Dash scale mode for the HARP engine: "CONTINUOUS" or "DISCRETE".

members.name: LineJoin
members.description: Line join style: "round", "miter", "bevel".

members.name: LineDashOffset
members.description: Offset into the dash pattern.

members.name: MiterLimit
members.description: Miter limit when LineJoin is "miter".

members.name: GetTrafficIncidentsAsync(double north, double south, double east, double west)
GetTrafficFlowAsync(double north, double south, double east, double west)
Active
members.description: Whether the zoom rectangle tool is active.

members.name: Alignment
members.description: UI alignment position.
